title: Product
description: Canonical product record for Adjacent ingestion. Required fields are id and description. Optional fields support richer prompts and retrieval later.

id.description: Stable product identifier. Must be unique within the catalog.

description.description: Primary semantic text used for embedding and LLM inference.

price.description: Numeric price in the given currency.

currency.description: Currency code or symbol, e.g. USD.

metadata.description: Optional flat metadata. Values must be primitives or arrays of primitives.

total_query_count.description: Number of times this product has been queried as an anchor (incremented on each query, before inference decision).

last_inference_at.description: Timestamp of the most recent inference run for this anchor (set by workers after LLM call completes).

inference_count.description: Number of times inference has been run for this anchor (incremented by workers after LLM call).
